attributes.description: The Mazda 2 Dynamic Auto is the middle of the Mazda2 range and our most popular Mazda 2. Some of the standard features include, air conditioning, touch screen radio/cd with Bluetooth, Apple Car Play/Android Auto, keyless start, cruise control, a 5 Star EURO NCAP safety rating and incredible fuel consumption of just 6 l/100km. The Mazda 2 also comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage Service Plan, Warranty and Roadside Assistance as standard, with the option to extend.
